iana.template_text:
(registered 2014-07-25, last updated 2014-07-25)  

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.doremir.scorecloud-binary-document

Required parameters : n/a

Optional parameters : 

   version=(1*DIGIT "." 1*DIGIT) / (1*DIGIT "." 1*DIGIT "." 1*DIGIT)

   This is the version of the format. x.y is equivalent to x.y.0

Encoding considerations : binary

Security considerations :  ScoreCloud documents contain 
   representations of music. It has no active content, it doesn't 
   employ compression, and it doesn't contain sensitive information.

Interoperability considerations : The format consists of serialized 
   object structures, and is therefore only usable in the context of 
   a compatible implementation.

Published specification :  none yet

Applications which use this media : ScoreCloud Studio, ScoreCloud 
   Express, My ScoreCloud (web application)

Fragment identifier considerations : n/a

Restrictions on usage : n/a

Additional information :

   1. Deprecated alias names for this type : n/a
   2. Magic number(s) : n/a
   3. File extension(s) : scld
   4. Macintosh file type code : n/a
   5. Object Identifiers: n/a

Person to contact for further information :

   1. Name : Erik Ronström
   2. Email : erik.ronstrom&doremir.com

Intended usage : Common

   Communicating documents for the ScoreCloud applications, esp. with 
   regards to in-browser rendering of such documents by the use of 
   plug-ins.

Author/Change controller : Erik Ronström, Sven Emtell (DoReMIR Music 
   Research AB, Sweden)
